resources.string: Welcome! This resume app was created to showcase the projects I contributed to.
In this project I had to build a Java program to get data from an SQL database and display it on a GUI.
In this project I had a Raspberry Pi which I had to connect to motors and sensors, and then write code in Java so it could operate autonomously.
In this project I had to build an application which was able to simulate a festival based on a user made planning.

In this project we had to build a java project that had to communicate with an SQL database to get weather data. The connection with the database was already given, we had to implement code to control a given GUIboard to make a weatherstation that was controlled with three buttons.

In this project we were given a raspberry pi with a motor shield and some motors. We had to interview our customer to discover what he wanted. We had to make the robot follow lines, listen to a tv remote, send a route via bluetooth through our own made java application while also detecting distance.

In this project we had to build a java application were the user was able to setup and import a planning and some more details about a festival. Then there was a simulation tab which allowed to user to start the simulation to see the festival happening according to their planning.
In this project I had to build an Android application to showscase which I projects I worked on.
In this project I had to build a resume app in which the projects I worked on would be visible. The user is able to see all the projects in the list and able to tap on them for more details.
Click on a project to see more details
